title.value: Data Standards Wales Questionnaire Question Codes

description.value: Resource structure is based on UKCore-QuestionnaireQuestionCodes v1.0.0 which is not yet included in a balloted release. Added manually to prevent structure deviation and to support NHS Wales projects. Once available, the resource will be updated and derived from UK Core. A set of codes that define questions or groups of questions, consisting of the entirety of the SNOMED CT UK Coding System. This set of codes may not necessarily be complete or appropriate and may require further discussion in the future.
